description: Doxygen XML to Markdown (or JSON) converter. Generate beautiful C++ documentation by converting Doxygen XML output into markdown pages via MkDocs, Hugo, VuePress, GitBook, Docsify, or your custom generator. Also comes with an optional templating mechanism and extensive configuration file.
displayName: doxybook2 – Doxygen XML to Markdown (or JSON)
author: Matus Novak
